creator: Martin.Edge@asmorphic.net.au
text:
Created attachment 22054
[patch] The Subversion patch file for the change

There was already a feature which controls selection of the paper tray type within the PCL Renderer and Generator code. 

This has now been extended to also support duplex type selection. 

Documentation for the website has also been updated.

Martin, thanks for the patch. It looks good except for a typo in the docs which I can easily fix. I wanted to ask: Do you mind if I rename the new extension attribute to "duplex-mode"? "page-is-duplex", to me, suggests that it takes a boolean rather than an integer. "duplex-mode" seems clearer to me. WDYT?
creator: jeremias@apache.org

text:
Just noting Martin's reply that went to the mailing list:
On 03.06.2008 15:53:35 Martin Edge wrote:
> Sounds fine on the name change

Patch applied under section 5 of the ALv2:
http://svn.apache.org/viewvc?rev=662807&view=rev

Modification to the patch:
- Renamed "page-is-duplex" to "duplex-mode".

Thanks!
creator: jeremias@apache.org
